The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie

context.text: List of Best Actress winners by age at win - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Rank Age Name Film Annual Year Date of Birth Date of Award Notes
List of Best Actress winners by age at win

This is a list of winners of the Academy Award of Merit for Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role , presented annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS) to an actress who has delivered an outstanding performance while working within the film industry . More popularly known as the Academy Award (or the Oscar) for Best Actress , this award was initially presented at the 1st Academy Awards ceremony for 1927 and 1928 and was most recently presented at the 80th Academy Awards ceremony for 2007 . Throughout the past 80 years, accounting for ties and repeat winners, AMPAS has presented a total of 81 Best Actress awards to 67 different actresses. This is a list of winners arranged in descending order by age of the actress on the date of the award ceremony in which she was named Best Actress. This list is current as of the 80th Academy Awards ceremony held on February 24, 2008.
List of Best Actress winners by age at win
